casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Allen Ray WEST 193P15-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 William V. Conley, Special Deputy Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Allen Ray West, for West, Allen Ray.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of November 2017 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
